commit.message:
server: Add DATABASE_OPTIONS to settings

This is required for some use cases such as configuring SSL certificates
with remote database backends.

commit.message:
CLI: Add '--long' to 'playbook list'

We choose to exclude some columns by default and move them under
'--long' in case there is a use case for them:

- name won't always be set and so can be irrelevant
- the amount of plays isn't as important as tasks, results and hosts
- the amount of files and records isn't particularly critical

Change-Id: Ia7a6a91973c9735140a6c2c9c691dac6ab7f7db2

verification.payload:
tree 1ef5bdd8edce69dbb1301fba1cdcc3718c6655b8

author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597893466 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597893466 -0400

CLI: Add '--long' to 'playbook list'

We choose to exclude some columns by default and move them under
'--long' in case there is a use case for them:

- name won't always be set and so can be irrelevant
- the amount of plays isn't as important as tasks, results and hosts
- the amount of files and records isn't particularly critical

Change-Id: Ia7a6a91973c9735140a6c2c9c691dac6ab7f7db2

commit.message:
CLI: Add '--resolve' to 'ara result list'

This translates IDs into human-readable identifiers.

For performance purposes, we try to avoid querying for the same
playbook, play, host or task more than once by using lru_cache.

Change-Id: I2862bf6814ee17da2ee9d60b1af61eb5e4c9f4ec

verification.payload:
tree a6032aeee092f8fca4233be6e1d11ed7754d5fdc
parent 90a63a1825b0fb20ab9ee4ff03387458526226ad
author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597890587 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597891302 -0400

CLI: Add '--resolve' to 'ara result list'

This translates IDs into human-readable identifiers.

For performance purposes, we try to avoid querying for the same
playbook, play, host or task more than once by using lru_cache.

Change-Id: I2862bf6814ee17da2ee9d60b1af61eb5e4c9f4ec

commit.message:
CLI: Add '--long' argument to ara result list

We have to be opinionated about the columns we return by default because
we do not have unlimited width to display data in.

The 'changed' and 'ignore_errors' fields are somewhat combined into the
status field that returns 'changed' or 'ignored' while the 'play' field
is not necessarily required if the task and host context are present.

Change-Id: I6c26424a53bb89df18a2f4d7aafe42fe93a2b171

verification.payload:
tree 0d4c0f9482509b982c762f62c3c75840279666aa

author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597890307 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597891295 -0400

CLI: Add '--long' argument to ara result list

We have to be opinionated about the columns we return by default because
we do not have unlimited width to display data in.

The 'changed' and 'ignore_errors' fields are somewhat combined into the
status field that returns 'changed' or 'ignored' while the 'play' field
is not necessarily required if the task and host context are present.

Change-Id: I6c26424a53bb89df18a2f4d7aafe42fe93a2b171

tests: pin factory-boy to <3.0

factory-boy just released a new 3.0 (and 3.0.1) version and it breaks
unit tests:
    AttributeError: module 'factory' has no attribute 'DjangoModelFactory'

Pin to <3.0 which is currently 2.12.0 while we figure it out.

commit.message: Merge "centos8 container: tweak package installation"

Fix settings regression and unpin dynaconf

Settings were failing to load with dynaconf>=3.0 because there was a
breaking change that disabled environments loading [1].

Fixes: https://github.com/ansible-community/ara/issues/149

[1]: https://www.dynaconf.com/release_notes/#breaking-changes

Change-Id: Ia97ba4a7f10aedc3b3c30b58beed68baa329cad3

verification.payload:
tree d13fb912e6e37f248f4589f0cfb49f4603846a4a
parent 8628be9c45c1240c931acda26357dd4c4e1c2b49
author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597104597 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1597104597 -0400

Fix settings regression and unpin dynaconf

Settings were failing to load with dynaconf>=3.0 because there was a
breaking change that disabled environments loading [1].

Fixes: https://github.com/ansible-community/ara/issues/149

[1]: https://www.dynaconf.com/release_notes/#breaking-changes

Change-Id: Ia97ba4a7f10aedc3b3c30b58beed68baa329cad3

commit.message:
API: Stop excluding created/updated fields from lists

Some resources don't have started/ended attributes but all of them have
a "created" and an "updated" field.

Stop excluding them because they can be helpful.

Change-Id: I1271bf2b1bbe7cc481112d5e0ff8f9579baa2d7d

committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1596322012 -0400

API: Stop excluding created/updated fields from lists

Some resources don't have started/ended attributes but all of them have
a "created" and an "updated" field.

Stop excluding them because they can be helpful.

commit.message:
centos8 container: tweak package installation

- don't install pymysql: mysqlclient is the package we need [1]
- use newly packaged python3-mysql from epel and drop development
  dependencies [2]

commit.message:
container-images: incorporate, test and publish centos8

This leverages the contribution from Fabian [1] for building an image
based on CentOS8.
The image will be built and tested for every new patch with Zuul and
it'll be pushed to DockerHub [2] after every merge.

The tag nomenclature had to be changed in order to fit the distribution
as an attribute, before:
- latest (tagged from source-latest)
- pypi-latest
- distribution-latest
- source-latest

to:
- latest (tagged from fedora32-source-latest)
- fedora32-source-latest
- fedora32-distribution-latest
- fedora32-pypi-latest
- centos8-pypi-latest

[1]: https://github.com/ansible-community/ara/commit/8491cc5a72e24de5e1f608f39ba7c0997601c279
[2]: https://hub.docker.com/r/recordsansible/ara-api

Change-Id: I971abd97039a28e825b6b7cd43a7559abe709f30

verification.payload:
tree 9bdda7d8e21c7beac7a47562d0b4b26bd0a4863a
parent 7fa7e80566cdf74d8cbc274a4cae829133991072
author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595548787 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595553528 -0400

container-images: incorporate, test and publish centos8

This leverages the contribution from Fabian [1] for building an image
based on CentOS8.
The image will be built and tested for every new patch with Zuul and
it'll be pushed to DockerHub [2] after every merge.

The tag nomenclature had to be changed in order to fit the distribution
as an attribute, before:
- latest (tagged from source-latest)
- pypi-latest
- distribution-latest
- source-latest

to:
- latest (tagged from fedora32-source-latest)
- fedora32-source-latest
- fedora32-distribution-latest
- fedora32-pypi-latest
- centos8-pypi-latest

[1]: https://github.com/ansible-community/ara/commit/8491cc5a72e24de5e1f608f39ba7c0997601c279
[2]: https://hub.docker.com/r/recordsansible/ara-api

Change-Id: I971abd97039a28e825b6b7cd43a7559abe709f30

commit.message:

100 is a bit much as a default as it pans more than an entire screen
worth of lines. Make it configurable via ARA_CLI_LIMIT.

commit.message:
CLI: Add status filtering to 'ara host list'

This adds the "--with(out)-{failed,changed,unreachable}" arguments
to 'ara host list' in order to filter hosts based on task result stats.

Change-Id: If0d61cc7d9adf962e8e6a2740660d53e3bb2799c

verification.payload:
tree 33a636be24f88495e35095b3d5bdfc623f2f9f84
parent 2827d43ac458cf0ae0582761e92fdce31f21577a
author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595458970 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595466464 -0400

CLI: Add status filtering to 'ara host list'

This adds the "--with(out)-{failed,changed,unreachable}" arguments
to 'ara host list' in order to filter hosts based on task result stats.

Change-Id: If0d61cc7d9adf962e8e6a2740660d53e3bb2799c

commit.message:
API: Add stats host filter for 'gt >' and 'lt <'

This provides the ability to search for hosts based on their stats.

For example:

- return hosts with no changes: /api/v1/hosts?changed__lt=1
- return hosts with failures: /api/v1/hosts?failed__gt=0
- return hosts with unreachable tasks: /api/v1/hosts?unreachable__gt=0

Change-Id: Iccd74c3e419fdd52b8305505335f57d599eec1ee

verification.payload:
tree 16130a95934fab77d32496d6d0152ad88fffb006
parent 96e26dc6509ef6cf528c609c558160fdc12094c8
author David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595457671 -0400
committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595466134 -0400

API: Add stats host filter for 'gt >' and 'lt <'

This provides the ability to search for hosts based on their stats.

For example:

- return hosts with no changes: /api/v1/hosts?changed__lt=1
- return hosts with failures: /api/v1/hosts?failed__gt=0
- return hosts with unreachable tasks: /api/v1/hosts?unreachable__gt=0

Change-Id: Iccd74c3e419fdd52b8305505335f57d599eec1ee

zuul: temporarily disable ara-report in post logs

The role no longer works since a change that now prohibits local
execution on the executor [1] and this makes the jobs hit POST_FAILURE.

It is not critical so disable it while we figure it out.

[1]: https://review.opendev.org/#/c/742229/

Change-Id: I127463ae0fa6661e72d77d5af960062f7abdf134

committer David Moreau Simard <moi@dmsimard.com> 1595385745 -0400

zuul: temporarily disable ara-report in post logs

The role no longer works since a change that now prohibits local

It is not critical so disable it while we figure it out.
